page.title: 13HOPE END ANDREWS VIEW.
page.content: I live on a smallholding at Hope End.We don't have a shop,church or pub,so my mum goes to Bishops Stortford for most of her shopping.My dad is'nt just a farmer,he helps fly aeroplanes.We have 100 chickens,ducks and geese whose eggs we sell.Mum collects the eggs two or three times a day or they get smashed.My dog helps to keep the fox away.We have four cows.We sell their calves at market.We grow potatoes,onions,tomatoes,runner and broad beans.We also grow soft fruit,and have cherry,pear,plum and apple trees.We sell most of the fruit at the market.As it is so open,it is wet and windy in winter and it is difficult to feed the animals but we like living at Hope End because it is quiet and pretty.
